patthana16.87:1.1_0: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ upekkhāsahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho naupekkhāsahagato
patthana16.87:1.1_1: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ upekkhāsahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
patthana16.87:1.1_2: nasanidassanasappaṭigho naupekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe… anidassanaappaṭighaṁ
patthana16.87:1.1_3: upekkhāsahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho naupekkhāsahagato ca naanidassanasappaṭigho
patthana16.87:1.1_4: naupekkhāsahagato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe
patthana16.87:2.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ naupekkhāsahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nanaupekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
